about_the_game:
This package is intended to support the two man dev team
A pack of the main soundtracks of Evolvation in mp3 format.

The tracks:
Evolvation - Into the void
Evolvation - Space Rush
Evolvation - Spacing
Evolvation - Transcendence

The files will be added to your Evolvation folder.
detailed_description:
This package is intended to support the two man dev team
A pack of the main soundtracks of Evolvation in mp3 format.

The tracks:
Evolvation - Into the void
Evolvation - Space Rush
Evolvation - Spacing
Evolvation - Transcendence

The files will be added to your Evolvation folder.
name: Evolvation - Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-Bit or 32-Bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD FX-6100, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible GPU, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350, or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 with 2 GB Video RAM (current equivalent NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760) | AMD Radeon HD 7770 with 2 GB Video RAM, or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: This package is intended to support the two man dev team A pack of the main soundtracks of Evolvation in mp3 format. The tracks: Evolvation - Into the void Evolvation - Space Rush Evolvation - Spacing Evolvation - Transcendence
